artist: Artist: Darryl Ayo; Artist: Thomas Hurlburt; Publisher: Darryl Ayo
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical text and illustration of crying figure wearing sunglasses printed in offset lithography on wove paper covers; 16 pp.
title: Comics by AYO: Don't Cry, Emo-Guy
